thread.title: The Wall Street Journal: Cigna reportedly near deal to acquire Express Scripts

title: The Wall Street Journal: Cigna reportedly near deal to acquire Express Scripts
text:
Health insurer Cigna Corp. plans to buy Express Scripts Holding Co. in a cash-and-stock deal worth $52 billion, excluding debt, that the companies say will expand their health care offerings and help them control costs.
Under the terms of the agreement, Express Scripts shareholders will receive $48.75 in cash and 0.2434 shares in the combined company for each Express Scripts share. The consideration amounts to about $96.03 for each Express Scripts share, a 31% premium over Express Scriptsâ€™ Wednesday closing price of $73.42.
